channel.title: Quantum Computation on c0nrad's c0rner
channel.description: Recent content in Quantum Computation on c0nrad's c0rner

item.title: Quantum Circuit Editor Pt. 1
item.description: Initial version of a quantum circuit editor.

item.title: Randomized Benchmarking of a noisy quantum simulator Pt. 2
Randomized Benchmarking of a noisy quantum simulator Pt. 1
item.description: This post covers the simplest of error models and some simulated randomized benchmarking results.

item.title: Density Operators
item.description: This post covers my transition from using pure states to mixed states in my quantum simulator.

item.title: Mulbrute
item.description: QHack 2021 submission project, a tool for brute forcing quantum multiplication circuits.

item.title: Shor's Algorithm
item.description: Shor’s algorithm is probably the most well known quantum algorithm. But it turns out I didn’t understand it as well as I thought.

item.title: Simulating Quantum Fourier Transform
item.description: I’m pretty excited. I’m somewhat in disbelief that it even works. But I was able to implement Quantum Fourier Transform on my little quantum computation simulator.

item.title: Quantum Teleportation Algorithm
item.description: This post is split into two parts. The first section is my motivation, and some background on the upgrades I made to my quantum simulator. The second part is implementing the Quantum Teleportation algorithm.
